name: One Pesky UFO
description:
Shoot down the big purple UFO, before it, ahm, strangely hovers around the city!

  • WASD / Arrows — Steer ship
  • Space — Shoot
  • R — Restart

Notes

  • There's no sound
  • It's weird and buggy : )
  • This game was made for Trijam #125, theme: "One Enemy Only".
  • This game was made in pretty much exactly 3 hours (excluding ideation, compile-time and publishing.)
  • It should at least work in Chrome, Firefox and Itch App.
